LeBron James @KingJames Verified. Quoted. NBA @NBA Verified Business. LeBron James' classic chalk toss has been a Christmas tradition in the NBA for years 👑
Watch LeBron James in action on Monday, Christmas Day against the Celtics at 5:00pm/et on ABC/ESPN! hashtag NBAXmas pic.twitter.com/P2vOKDRyDY. LeBron James @KingJames Verified. Added This was amazing!! 💨💨💨💨🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾. I do wish we had Xmas day uniforms across the league still. Wonder why it stopped. 🤷🏾‍♂️. 20 hours ago. 969 replies. 4186 retweets. 60826 likes. 4836661 verified views.
